analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0x9b0fdba9173f47a2930ac838ab02b4c2a0040f89.sol:
	Contract WTToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0x9b0fdba9173f47a2930ac838ab02b4c2a0040f89.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

WTToken._totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x9b0fdba9173f47a2930ac838ab02b4c2a0040f89.sol#71)
WTToken.crowdSale should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x9b0fdba9173f47a2930ac838ab02b4c2a0040f89.sol#71-72)
WTToken.founder should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x9b0fdba9173f47a2930ac838ab02b4c2a0040f89.sol#72-73)
WTToken.platform should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x9b0fdba9173f47a2930ac838ab02b4c2a0040f89.sol#74-77)
WTToken.team should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x9b0fdba9173f47a2930ac838ab02b4c2a0040f89.sol#73-74)
Parameter '_address' of WTToken.preSale (/unique_chucks/12/0x9b0fdba9173f47a2930ac838ab02b4c2a0040f89.sol#110) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of WTToken.preSale (/unique_chucks/12/0x9b0fdba9173f47a2930ac838ab02b4c2a0040f89.sol#110) is not in mixedCase
